title: Did PM Modi Disrespect Senior Leader Advani In This Viral Photo?
subtitle: The photo is from the function where the government released a commemorative coin in the honour of former Prime Minister Atal Bihari Vajpayee and Modi did respond to Advani’s gesture.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
Over the last few years, there has been significant chatter on how the current top brass of Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) has ignored, or even worse, disrespected the party veteran Lal Krishna Advani.

An image featuring Advani and Prime Minister Narendra Modi that recently went viral, stoked the fire of this narrative.
